programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Ramsay asks the chefs to create three Asian-fusion dishes using poultry, seafood and beef. Both teams crack under pressure when they go head-to-head during the dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA

programme.title: Andromeda: The Illusion of Majesty

programme.title: Andromeda: Twilight of the Idols

programme.title: Sensing Murder: A Mother's Worst Nightmare

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Fallen Angel

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Out of the Dark
programme.desc: Described as a brutal execution, 46-year-old grandmother Chattrice Maihi-Carroll was found naked, stabbed to death in her New Zealand home in 2008. There were multiple suspects and everything seemed resolved following the arrest of a neighbour.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Lost for Words
programme.desc: Spirited teenager Jayne Furlong dreamed of becoming a child psychologist - instead, she ended up a prostitute. In 1993, 17 year old Jayne vanished from her patch on Auckland's Karangahape Road.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Blood Sport: The Bondi Gay Murders

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Ivan Milat: The Backpacker Murders
programme.desc: The backpacker murder case in the Belanglo State Forest, south west of Sydney, has entered Australian criminal folklore.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Anita Cobby Murder
programme.desc: In February 1986, nurse Anita Cobby, a former entrant in the Miss Australia quest, is walking home from Blacktown station in Sydney's outer-western suburbs. A Holden sedan pulls up and Anita is dragged into the vehicle.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Killing Fields of Truro
programme.desc: For the 2008 launch of Crime Investigation Australia, CI presents the complete and compelling story of "The Killing Fields of Truro", one of the most infamous crimes in Australia and yet another set in Adelaide.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: CLAIRE and TESS save a neighbour from a burning shed, but all is not as it seems. His desperate act prompts CLAIRE to work harder than ever to keep Drovers Run and Tess reveals why she’s frightened of true love.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Theft is on everyone’s mind and the women on Drover’s Run have their own style of justice.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: When CLAIRE attends a seminar she leaves TESS in charge of Drovers Run and on her return she discovers a lot more can happen in twenty four hours than she would ever have imagined or, at least, would have led TESS to believe.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Pushed by a neighbour’s untimely death Harry works too hard and is found trapped under a tractor. Fearing the end Harry continues to play one son off against the other and Tess learns a shocking secret from Liz.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: A celebratory night out almost ends in disaster when a plan to stop Brian’s misdeeds backfires.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: More Than One Way …
programme.desc: Claire is about to achieve her dream, and wants Tess to have hers - that little cafe in Brunswick she used to talk about.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: For nearly 20 years, T&T Supermarket dominated sales, but now competition is “cut throat”. That's good enough reason for Tina Lee, the boss of T&T Supermarket, to swap her upscale lifestyle for a week working undercover in her own stores.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Jose Mas, the CEO of MasTec, one of the largest builders of telecommunication and energy systems in North America, poses as a recently laid off high school basketball coach, getting a second chance at starting a new career.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Barrels of Boos

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Leland has a full plate of fugitives in Kona, and the whole family heads to the Big Island to help.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mama's Boys
programme.desc: Dog visits his mother's grave for inspiration before heading out to find Frankie, a violent fugitive hiding in the jungle. The spirit of Ma Chapman seems to help when Dog finds an unusual ally; Frankie's mother.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Lost in Paradise
programme.desc: Dog lectures high school students about the dangers of drugs before going after Joseph, a dangerous fugitive who won't be easy to capture.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Coaching Day
programme.desc: Dog takes the day off to try his hand at coaching, and assigns Tim and Leland to track down a dangerous fugitive on their own. Can the boys prove they can handle it?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Women of Waikiki
programme.desc: The boys get distracted by the bikini-clad lovelies on Waikiki when they hunt for Lucy, a homeless, alcoholic fugitive. Beth is amused by the boys, but this is serious business: Tim will have to pay the bond if Lucy isn't caught.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: To Capture One's Own
programme.desc: Dog faces a tough personal and professional situation when he must hunt down his friend, Ili, who has helped him on many busts. But now Ili's on the other side of the law, and now Dog must bring her in.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Bags and Boxers
programme.desc: Dog is out to make two grabs on two islands in one day. Part of the team is goes to Kona to nab a woman who skipped her court date. Meanwhile, Dog and the others hunt Patrick, a fugitive who's fighting in an Extreme Boxing event on the Big Island.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cats & Dogs
programme.desc: Dog has only a few days to catch a woman nicknamed Cats or forfeit Beth's $10,000 bond. But it won't be easy - Cats is eight months pregnant, so Dog will have to lure her in rather than risk a violent grab.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Destiny Love
programme.desc: Dog is in for a big surprise after he catches a fugitive named Jonaven in a sting operation.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: If You Knew Nunu
programme.desc: Dog and the team really have their hands full when they go after a tough guy named Nunu, who leads them on a chase through apartment complexes and a shopping mall before he's finally captured.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Double Trouble
programme.desc: Dog's feeling lucky, so he's going to try to capture two women in one day. The first, Moani, has "crazy" tattooed on her neck and is facing drug charges. The second fugitive, Jade, who turns out to be a tough catch, despite help from Jade's sister.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Going Si-ral
programme.desc: Si discovers Youtube, and, after watching a series of instructional videos, decides he can make something better. John Luke totals Willie's truck, and Willie realizes he may be raising the two worst drivers in all of Louisiana.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack-O-Lantern
programme.desc: The Robertsons host a Halloween event at Duck Commander, where they all come together to transform the warehouse into a "scarehouse." Everyone dresses up and Willie desperately tries to be the scariest, but none of the kids are afraid of him.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: O Little Town of West Monroe
programme.desc: The Robertsons perform a live nativity for their Church for Christmas, so the wives organize rehearsals to ensure that they pull off a great event. However, rehearsals get off to a bumpy start as the guys can't stop sharing their opinions.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Boomerang Becca
programme.desc: When Rebecca returns home from her internship in Los Angeles, the Robertson family plans a big surprise party to welcome her back. Meanwhile, when Uncle Si gets sick, he seeks the help of Ms. Kay to take care of him.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Willie's Number Two
programme.desc: When Willie is looking to hire a new assistant, Korie insists he interviews her cousin, JD. Meanwhile, when Uncle Si spends the day over at Phil and Kay's, Jep stops by with the kids to keep them away from Jessica, who has taken ill.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Life of Si
programme.desc: After seeing footage Jep shot using a GoPro, Si decides he wants to use the camera to record a day in his life. But when Si gets on the guys nerves while they're hunting, they kick him and his GoPros out of the blind.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: From Duck 'til Dawn
programme.desc: When the duck guys have to pull an all-nighter to finish some work, Willie decides he wants to join them. But when a dying smoke detector distracts them from their work, Jase and Willie head off to disarm it.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Burger Commander
programme.desc: After visiting a popular burger restaurant, Willie and Jase get into a debate over which of them cooks the best burger, prompting them to challenge one another to a cooking contest.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: G.I. Si
programme.desc: When Willie and Jase argue over an old G.I. Joe toy, it leads them into a debate over who would make a better soldier. To settle the score, Willie and Jase head out to the woods with their friends and children for a paintball match.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Jase and the Argonauts
programme.desc: When Willie gets a soft serve machine for himself, he tells the guys they can't use it until they're done working. But when Jase thinks this is unfair, he takes matters into his own hands and finds a better object to use as motivation.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Fifty SAR members from Princeton and Penticton SAR search for an elderly woman who disappeared.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Bears converge on an injured tree faller alone in the wilderness as Nelson SAR races to the scene.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Kent Harrison uses high tech sonar to help RCMP search for a missing camper.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: A snowmobiler trapped 30 metres down an icy crevasse says goodbye to his wife and family.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson SAR team up with a local psychic to find a missing person.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Rossland SAR employs high tech and local knowledge to search for missing skiers.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whistler SAR is on a mountain mission for missing friends who failed to show up for a landmark birthday party.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Several SAR teams are called out after 200 snowmobilers arereported buried on Boulder Mountain near Revelstoke BC.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whistler SAR extracts a severely injured stunt snowmobiler. And later, teams search for two people swept down a raging river.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whistler Search and Rescue helicopter long-lines an injured snowmobiler off a steep mountainside.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Family Guy
programme.desc: Jazmin's final straw was when Darren brought another woman over and lied about Jazmin being his sister and his daughter being his niece. Darren feels he's a good father who pays the bills and doesn't need to answer to anyone if he's not married.

programme.title: Divorce Court: The Punisher
programme.desc: Shea says Jessica constantly punishes him due her history of cheating exes. She must know where Shea is every second forcing his friends to cut ties. Jessica has caught Shea lying to her in the past. Can Judge Lynn Toler get them on track?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Thin Line Between Love and Hate
programme.desc: When the going got tough, Dermartess left his children and Rofiesha. Dermartess says Rofiesha forced him to leave 7 years ago. He still loves her and wants to see his children but believes she was too toxic. Can Judge Lynn Toler save this couple?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Enough Is Enough
programme.desc: Dwight has had it with Roxy's mental abuse. Dwight says Roxy has cost him multiple jobs because she's constantly harassing him at work, but she says he needs to give her the attention she deserves! Can Judge Toler help them see eye to eye?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Sick and Tired
programme.desc: Timothy is tired of being kicked out the house every time Erin catches an attitude. If she kicks him out once more, he's gone for good. Erin says she dropped out of college and left behind a full tennis scholarship because of him.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Heart Break Hotel
programme.desc: Brianna says Steven constantly looks at other women behind her back which has taken a toll on her confidence. He says her overprotectiveness leads to arguments that end up with her accusing him of cheating.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Tapped Out
programme.desc: Lataisha says Chris smokes weed all day and can’t keep a job. Things seemed to be going fine until one day she walked downstairs in their home and realized that Chris moved out. Chris says he left because she is too aggressive.

programme.title: Divorce Court: In My Feelings
programme.desc: Raymond, also known as @IamRollingRay, is an Instagram sensation who says his high school sweetheart is jealous of his social media fan base. Christian thinks Ray shows more attention to his fanbase, accusing him of cheating with his followers.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Caught Up
programme.desc: Syncere says Mark has lied and disrespected her on several occasions and she’s not going to stand for it anymore. Mark says he cheats on Syncere because she has a bad attitude and she gets on his nerves.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Runaway Love Part 1
programme.desc: After 21 years together, LaSonya claims her husband still can’t keep his pants zipped and quit the flirting. Daniea Lanier says he is fed up with her attitude and feels she would be happier if she had more self-esteem.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Runaway Love Part 2
programme.desc: After 21 years together, LaSonya claims her husband still can’t keep his pants zipped and quit the flirting. Daniea Lanier says he is fed up with her attitude and feels she would be happier if she had more self-esteem.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Lesbihonest
programme.desc: Porcha has had enough of Ivory's promiscuous behavior. He claims Porcha has more tricks and secrets than Houdini and her lying has taken its toll. Can Judge Lynn Toler help this couple or is it time for Cupid to take better aiming lessons?

programme.title: Operation Repo: Coffee-slinging Waitress
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Froy storm a studio to repossess a Corvette from a surly European photographer and his hapless, bikini-clad subjects. Then, Lou and Matt stumble into a lover's quarrel - will they be able to reclaim the vehicle from two suited suitors?

programme.title: Operation Repo: Doomsday Prep
programme.desc: Matt and Froy struggle with language barriers when an Italian photographer and his assistant resort to violence because they can't comprehend. Will Sonia finally reveal what's happening, or will carrying her brother's burden get the best of her?

programme.title: Operation Repo: Couple of Yups/Bottled Feelings/A Screw Loose
programme.desc: First, Frankie and Lyndah find themselves in a fancy neighborhood, dealing with a pair of uptight yuppies with well-coordinated clothes and well-coordinated attacks. Then Lyndah goes wild when a truck-driving debtor gets physical with Sonia.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Honor Rolling Away
programme.desc: Sonia and Lyndah find themselves at a local University trying to reclaim a car from a not-so-honorable honor roll student with a squeaky voice. Then, Matt and Sonia are tasked with snagging a tricked-out race car from two vested thugs armed with golf club

programme.title: Operation Repo: Role-players and Blade Swayers
programme.desc: Lou, Matt, and Froy get interrupted on a routine job by a registered owner with an unregistered blade. Then, Matt and Froy head out to the country to reclaim a Prius from a quintet of socially maladapted role-players.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Playing the Role
programme.desc: First, Lou devises a plan to have Froy and Sonia pose as house buyers, and a happily married couple, meanwhile Matt and Lou will hook and book. Then, Matt and Froy wrangle with an out-of-work actor.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Airplane Arrest
programme.desc: Froy and Sonia are overwhelmed by a swarm of cheerleaders; Matt and Froy interrupt a father and son bonding session gone wrong; the team heads to the raceway to prove they still have what it takes.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Strapped on the Court
programme.desc: Matt and Froy have to choose between the job and their lives when they're confronted by a dozen gun-toting basketball players. Then, Lou and Sonia have to crash a night-time family reunion to get their car.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Pepper Spray and Guns
programme.desc: First, Froy and Sonia douse a couple with a dose of pepper spray when the debtor gets too pushy with Sonia. Next, Matt and Froy battle biker girls when going after a motorcycle. And Finally, Matt and Froy confront a couple of delinquents.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Revenge
programme.desc: Matt and Froy take the opportunity to enact revenge on Ronnie and Carlos; a repo at a car wash gets out of hand; Lou's big mistake on a repo results in a debtor bringing the fight to their front door in a shootout.

programme.title: Operation Repo: A Vengeful Streak
programme.desc: Matt and Ronnie repo a Porsche from a maniac; Carlos and Ronnie come face to face during their repo of a cable van.

programme.desc: Washington family celebrates Sandra preparing for college. (S3, ep22)

programme.title: World's Greatest: Archipelagos
programme.desc: The romantic notion of island life has always attracted us. Explore the histories, cultures, and unique ways of life on the World’s Greatest Archipelagos - clusters of islands that share common bonds of geography, geology, and genealogy.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Lost Cities
programme.desc: Once powerful and populous centers of influence, these lost cities are providing clues to how our ancestors existed in the world and remind us that ancient civilizations were not so far removed from our own.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Drives
programme.desc: A journey by road expands our horizons, allowing us to explore the depth and breadth of whole countries and continents, stopping whenever and wherever we chose.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Island Nations
programme.desc: Though many are small in stature, they have punched well above their weight on the global stage. Some are rooted in ancient history, while others are only just beginning to realize their full potential.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Flights
programme.desc: Our experience of the world’s greatest marvels is literally and figuratively elevated when we explore them from the air. Whether you travel by air balloon, helicopter, light aircraft, a grand perspective is always guaranteed.

programme.title: Arthur: Buster's Back/The Ballad Of Buster Baxter
programme.desc: Buster's coming home! The word spreads fast, but so does the fear that Buster will be different. Then, it seems to Buster, not only have his friends changed while he was gone, but they've forgotten all about him! Will he ever fit in again?

programme.title: Arthur: Fernkenstein's Monster/D.W., Dancing Queen
programme.desc: Inspired by Mary Shelley's "Frankenstein," Fern tells a tale so scary that Arthur and the gang become afraid of her! Then, Binky decides to teach D.W. to dance, but she just doesn't seem to get the moves. Is D.W. a no-talent klutz?

programme.title: Arthur: Postcards from Buster, Parts I & II
programme.desc: Buster's going to New York City to meet his dad Bo, and the Reads are coming with him! He's thrilled ... but won't his mom miss him? But, Bitzi gives him a present that will let him share his exciting trip with her--a video camera!

programme.title: Arthur: D.W., Queen of the Comeback/In My Africa
programme.desc: The Tibbles tease, D.W. fires back, the Tibbles taunt, D.W. has a snappy comeback, and round and round they go! Will it ever end? Then, D.W.'s new classmate, Cheikh, is Brain's young cousin…and is also from Senegal, Africa!

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Goes To Camp/Buster Makes The Grade
programme.desc: Arthur and his friends go to summer camp where it's strictly boys vs. girls. Next, Buster Baxter is everyone's favorite jokester. Unfortunately, though, Buster's grades aren't as good as his jokes, and Buster may have to repeat third grade.

programme.title: Arthur
programme.desc: There is a virus spreading through Lakewood Elementary--it’s new nicknames and it’s changing how everyone treats each other! The playground has been quiet lately--too quiet--and the Tough Customers don't like it one bit.

programme.title: Arthur: Do You Speak George?/World Girls
programme.desc: Everyone at school is speaking their own made-up language, and George can't make sense of what anyone is saying. And it's the grand opening of World Girl World, which sells dolls from every country, and every girl in town is thrilled!

programme.title: Arthur: Buster's Garden of Grief/Through the Looking Glasses
programme.desc: Buster is in charge of the community garden, but it proves to be too much for just one person. Arthur can't find his glasses and has to get new ones, but the attention he is getting from these new glasses has gone straight to his head!

programme.title: Arthur: When Carl Met George/D.W. Swims with the Fishes
programme.desc: George is excited about his new friend, Carl. Then George learns that Carl has Asperger's Syndrome – can they remain good friends? D.W. and James enter the pre-school swim meet and recruit their big siblings to coach them.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: Their attack on the Soviet Union having failed, the German Army suffers a series of counter-offensives on the Eastern Front. Wehrmacht's losses are huge as the Soviets advance West.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: Allies turn the tide in the Atlantic, where initially German U-Boats harass freely convoys to supply Britain. The route to bring American soldiers who will land on D-Day is clear.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: Italy's failed attacks in the Mediterranean region draw in the Germans.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: Japan attacks the USA on 7 Dec 1941. For the next 6 months, they continue to have successful attacks.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: The German invasion of Russia from Operation Barbarossa on 22 June 1941 to Kursk on 5 July 1943.

programme.title: PSI Factor: Chronicles of the Paranormal

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the gang are replacing some old pipes outside the town hall. Molly, meanwhile, is practicing for her first aid exam with a reluctant JJ as guinea pig. When Wendy calls JJ’s yard to order a special pipe and Molly offers to deliver it.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is tiling a roof and calls at JJ’s yard to pick up the materials. But there is only one pallet of the requisite red tiles in stock, so JJ promises to send the remainder of the order as soon as his delivery arrives.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Train enthusiast Mr Bentley is away for the day and, in his absence, Mrs Bentley decides to surprise her husband by asking Bob to build him a brand new model railway in the shed.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Today’s the day that the machines get to build their brand new shelter. It’s going to be built into the side of a hill and made using found materials. Lofty, who slept outside at the old yard, decides that he’d like a place in the new shelter.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mr Beasley’s pipes and boiler are making banging noises and Bob is called in to replace them. Whilst Bob and Wendy are collecting the new Boiler from JJ, Molly explains that she is looking after Mrs Broadbent’s baby rabbits.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Scrambler is playing with the Sunflower Valley children; Sunny, Saffron, Carlo and Cassia in the playground. It’s the last day before they have to go back to school in Bobsville and they are all sad to be leaving.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and team are building a barn for Farmer Pickles’ sheep, which has to be ready for the lambing season. Farmer Pickles brings the sheep down from the hills and puts them in a pen until the barn is finished.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is demolishing an old house, and sends the floorboards and roof tiles for recycling. As he finishes the job, he gets a call from Mr Bentley who wants him to renovate the museum’s annexe, where Mr Ellis plans to exhibit the work of local artists.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob’s built a new waterwheel for the old watermill. He’s made it at the yard, but now needs to dismantle it to take it to the mill in sections. Bob needs Benny, Scoop, Lofty and Muck to carry the wheel sections through the marshland to the mill.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the team are drilling a special well at their homestead. The well has its own water tank, which needs to be raised from the ground on rocks. Wendy and Scrambler arrive for the first ever time in Sunflower Valley..

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is building a goat run for Farmer Pickles new goat – Giddy. It’s Travis’s job to collect Giddy from Meg MacDonald the goat breeder. Spud teases Travis about being slow and Travis resolves to collect the goat very quickly.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Scoop and Dizzy have spent the night at Bob’s old yard in Bobsville to help Wendy with some digging and mixing. The machines all wish that Wendy could come and live out in Sunflower Valley.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Scoop and the machines are in Sunflower Valley setting up Wendy’s caravan. Scoop contacts Muck to find out where Bob has got to. Muck explains that they haven’t left Bobsville yet because they’ve lost Bob’s Dad!

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mr Bentley is organising a winter fair in the town hall square and enlists Bob to help set up the stalls, lights and the centrepiece of the fair – a giant inflatable Santa Claus.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: The team are building a bunkhouse for Farmer Pickles guests The Pickers! Micky, Vicky and Little Ricky are helping with the sunflower harvest. The cabin is to be made of logs so Lofty’s job is very important today, lifting and laying the logs.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Its early morning in Sunflower Valley and Benny arrives bursting with enthusiasm. He’s not needed in Bobsville today and he’s come to the Valley to help. Today, the team are building Mr and Mrs Bentley’s special new house.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Wendy and Bob have a very special announcement to make. They are going to fix up an old Houseboat for Wendy to live in. There’s a lot of hard work to be done. They need to make a gang plank, fix solar panels and give it a really good clean.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob, Scoop and Skip are helping Mr Beasley to install a new Rockery when Mr Bentley appears to ask for Bob’s help. The Mayor wants to stage an art exhibition, but there are no available venues. Scoop suggests renovating the inside of the Old Mill.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mr Fothergill has a nasty case of dry rot, so Bob and crew will have to use some smelly chemicals to fix it. As these will affect Mr Fothergill’s allergies, he goes to his sister’s for the day. But she doesn’t get on with Hamish, his pet parrot.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Whilst Bob and the team build Annie Pickles new seafront house, Muck is worried that Scoop is a better digger than he is and decides to prove himself with a sandcastle competition.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: The Mutant X team learns about Lexa's estranged twin brother when he becomes the main target of an underground operation harvesting mutant organs.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Brennan and the Mutant X team join forces with a time-traveling mutant to diffuse a bomb threatening devastating consequences.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: While Brennan and Shalimar investigate a mysterious plane crash, Lexa contemplates her future with the Mutant X team.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: As the Mutant X team fights to retrieve a formula hidden in a collection of artwork, Shalimar is given vital information from a mysterious source.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Mutant X tracks down a rogue scientist while Shalimar breaks away from the team to help Adam save the scientist — and uncover the real bad guy.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Brennan is forced to return to his criminal past when Mutant X discovers that his old partner is involved in stealing secrets from the Dominion.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Heroes and Heartbreak
programme.desc: Augur is recruited by a Taelon weapons project, but the others are worried about his involvement. When the project is launched earlier than originally planned to fight a Jiridian fleet, the Earth is in danger.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Message in a Bottle
programme.desc: A Jiridian probe headed for Earth is shot down by the Taelon Embassy and crashes outside of D.C. Liam recovers the probe, but he, Augur, and Julia are captured by another underground resistance movement led by the real Colonel Liam Kincaid.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Crossfire
programme.desc: As the election draws near, Liam believes Zo'or is trying to have Jonathan Doors murdered. The Resistance worries that an attack is imminent at the final debate. Julia mobilizes a group to protect Doors against Liam's wishes.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Crackdown
programme.desc: An unknown woman saves Augur and Liam from the raids on the Resistance. Lili sabotages the mother ship, but Zo'or stops its total destruction. Lili is reportedly dead. The investigation on the President's shooter continues.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Vanished
programme.desc: Some who were detained during the Resistance sweep have not reappeared after their release. Lili is taken to a lab run by Sandoval and implanted. Renee tries to help Liam find the missing people.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Emancipation
programme.desc: A group posing as volunteers attacks using a stolen skrill prototype that does not require an implant to control. It is discovered that the skrill queen is also missing. The investigation leads to a resistance group called Black Wednesday.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Chosen One
programme.desc: Roxton is determined to help the chosen one find his way back to the elders and save the star of hope. Veronica and the others worry when Malone begins spending time with a strange women.

programme.title: The Lost World: Prophecy
programme.desc: A fortune teller gives the explorers startling predictions that prove eerily accurate, with Malone receiving a grim fortune Meanwhile Challenger and Summerlee try and evade highly-evolved raptors.

programme.title: The Lost World: Barbarians at the Gate
programme.desc: The explorer's last hope of leaving the plateau is destroyed when Drakul and his men come after them and their hot air balloon. A war breaks out between Drakul and Tribune, now armed with gunpowder.

programme.title: The Lost World: All or Nothing
programme.desc: After watching Summerlee fall from a destroyed bridge, Marguerite and Veronica attempt to find him. Tribune rescues Roxton but expects payment in kind.

programme.title: The Lost World: Amazons
programme.desc: The men find themselves embraced by a tribe of Amazons and discover they are to be studs for the breeding ritual, but this purpose may come with a fatal end.

programme.title: The Lost World: Tourist Season
programme.desc: Challenger builds a windmill. But when his generator is struck by lightning, a portal is opened that ushers in a helicopter carrying a family of tourists from the year 2000.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: After the excitement of yesterday's auction James Braxton has a long way to go to catch Charlie Ross. Beginning in the fishing village of Cullen in the Highlands of Scotland, they end up in Aberdeen for the auction showdown.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Charlie Ross and James Braxton battle it out for antiques as they wind through Scotland, starting in Tarland en route to auction in Hamilton.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Charlie Ross and James Braxton cruise for antiques in their classic 1954 Alpine Sunbeam which takes them through the scenic town of Blairgowrie to Glasgow for the auction showdown.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: It's been an incredible week for Charlie Ross who is well in front of James Braxton as they fight to become the king of buying and selling antiques. They start their final day in Kilbarchan and end at an auction showdown in Ayre, Scotland.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Veteran road tripper David Barby joins up with silver expert Margie Cooper for a mammoth journey from Northumberland to Lincolnshire in their classic car. Each expert aims to buy and auction antiques for profit but it's not plane sailing.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: It's day two and experts David Barby and Margie Cooper are battling it out in County Durham before winding their way to the auction in Scarborough.

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Labour And Love
programme.desc: More tears, tiffs and true love in Teen Mom UK. Megan has a baby, Amber has a meltdown, and romance is in the air for Mia. Sassi celebrates her 1st Mother's Day and Chloe tackles her weight. (S2, ep5)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Lads Trip
programme.desc: Megan welcomes a new addition to the family... a horse! Chloe heads to the gym while Jordan heads to Amsterdam. There are fireworks for Amber and Ste, and Sassi plans a Christening. (S2, ep6)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Making Memories
programme.desc: Sassi almost misses her own Christening, Amber helps Ste celebrate his big day, Chloe remembers what it's like being a teenager, Megan makes a decision and Mia is left feeling frustrated. (S2, ep7)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Now Or Never
programme.desc: In the season finale it's make or break for Megan and Dylan and you'll never guess who's going on a date! As Sassi boards a plane, Mia jumps out of one. Chloe treats herself, big time. (S2, ep8)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Make Or Break
programme.desc: Welcome to the world Teen Mom UK series 3. Join our favourite five feisty Brit teen mums for access all areas into their worlds of toddlers, tiffs, tapas and tough love! (S3, ep1)

programme.title: 48 Hours: Temptation
programme.desc: In June 2007, Dewayne Barrentine met Tausha Fields and soon after they began living together. Tausha told him some unbelievable stories about herself – leading Barrentine to verify her stories online, which resulted in the uncovering of a homicide.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Terror at the Morgue
programme.desc: Dr. O.C. Smith, a medical examiner, was apparently attacked on June 1, 2002, as he was leaving work. He was found wrapped in barbed wire with a bomb strapped to his neck. Dr. Smith survived but expressed concern that his assailant might attack again

programme.title: 48 Hours: To Hell and Back
programme.desc: An interview with 17-year-old Jacque Marris who reveals new details about her abduction and how she and Tamara Brooks, another teenage victim, survived a harrowing 12-hour kidnapping on Aug. 1, 2002.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Law and Mrs. Shelton
programme.desc: A report on Catherine Mehaffey Shelton, a criminal defense attorney from Dallas. She has been practicing law in Texas for nearly three decades and making headlines for nearly as long, primarily because strange things happen to the men in her life.

programme.title: 48 Hours: SolveThis Case: Who Killed Kay Wenal
programme.desc: Investigators ask for the public's help to solve the 2008 murder of Kay Wenal, a former model found dead in her home in Georgia.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A report on the 2009 death of Rhonda Casto, who went hiking in Oregon’s Columbia River Gorge with her boyfriend, Stephen Nichols, and she never returned home.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: The small northwest town of Twin Peaks, Washington is shaken up when the body of the Homecoming Queen, Laura Palmer, is discovered washed up on a riverbank, wrapped in plastic.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Agent Cooper enjoys the comforts of the Great Northern Hotel. Bobby Briggs and Mike Nelson are released from jail. Doctor Hayward hands over the autopsy report on Laura Palmer.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Ben Horne's brother, Jerry, arrives in Twin Peaks; James and Donna decide to be together. Ben and Jerry travel to One Eyed Jacks and meet with it's madam, Blackie O'Reilly. Audrey leaves a clue for Cooper.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: The next morning, Cooper meets with Audrey, who confesses to leaving him the note about One Eyed Jacks. Cooper tells Truman he can't remember who the killer was in his dream, but insists the dream is a code to solving the crime.
